{{Infobox Pokéball |name = Timer Ball |image = [[File:Timer Ball.png]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Timer Ball''. |price = Variable |catchTime = 1s |catchRate = Variable (Increases with more route kills) *+0% (0 route kills) *+15% (9920 route kills) |location =
*[[Timer Ball#Shops|Shops]] *[[Timer Ball#Dungeons|Dungeons]] }}
==Description==
The '''Timer Ball''' is a type of [[Poké Balls|Poké Ball]]. It automatically tries to catch a wild Pokémon after defeating it if is the highest type of Poké Ball active and there is a remaining supply in the Poké Ball selector.
==Details==
A specialized Poké Ball to capture Pokémon with, it provides an increased catch rate on routes with more Pokémon defeated and catches Pokémon in 1s.
==Rate==
===Routes===
{| class="wikitable" |+ Timer Ball |- ! Route kills !! Catch chance |- | 0 || 0 (Equal to Poké Ball) |- | 4793 || 5 (Equal to Great Ball) |- | 7789 || 10 (Equal to Ultra Ball) |- | 9920 || 15 |}
[[File:Timer Ball-catchrate-graph.png|X-axis: Route kills
Y-axis: Quick Ball catch rate|200px]]
===Dungeons===
{| class="wikitable" |+ Timer Ball Catch Rates |- ! % Time Remaining in Dungeon !! Catch chance (+%) |- | 0 || 15 |- | 9.09 || 10 (Equal to Ultra Ball) |- | 16.67 || 5 (Equal to Great Ball) |- | 100 || 0 (Equal to Poké Ball) |}
[[File:Timer Ball_Dungeon_Catch_Rate_Graph.png|X-axis: % Time Remaining in Dungeon
Y-axis: Catch rate|200px]]
== Acquisition == ===Shops=== {{ItemPrice/head‎|Pokéballs}} {{ItemPrice|[[Berry Master#Trades|Goldenrod City]]|20 - 40 Random [[File:Cheri.png|25px]] [[Berries#Gen 1 Berries|Gen 1 Berries]]
5 - 15 Random [[File:Persim.png|25px]] [[Berries#Gen 2 Berries|Gen 2 Berries]]}} |} |}
